import React,{use}from"react";import"./about.css";import Image from"../../assets/avatar-2.svg";import AboutBox from"./AboutBox";import pb from"../../pocketbase";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const About=()=>{const[avatarUrl,setavatarUrl]=useState("");const[description,setDescription]=useState("");const[skills,setSkills]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{//Fetching My Avatar
const fetchLogo=async()=>{try{// Get the record where Name == "Avatar"
const record=await pb.collection("HomeImages").getFirstListItem('Name="Me"');// Construct image URL using PocketBase SDK
const url=pb.files.getURL(record,record.Image);setavatarUrl(url);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching logo:",error);}};fetchLogo();//Fetching Description
const fetchDescription=async()=>{try{const record=await pb.collection("AboutDescription").getFirstListItem("");const desc=record.Name;setDescription(desc);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching HomeName:",error);}};fetchDescription();//Fetching Skills
const fetchSkills=async()=>{try{const records=await pb.collection("AboutSkills").getFullList();setSkills(records);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching skills:",error);}};fetchSkills();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"about container",id:"about",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"About Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__container grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:avatarUrl,alt:"",className:"about__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__data grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"about__description",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"",className:"btn",children:"Download CV"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about__skills grid",children:skills.map(skill=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills__data",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills__titles",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"skills__name",children:skill.Name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"skills__number",children:[skill.Percentage,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills__bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"skills__percentage development",style:{backgroundColor:skill.BackgroundColor,width:"".concat(skill.Percentage,"%")}})})]},skill.id))})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AboutBox,{})]});};export default About;
